name: Alphonso Mango Tree
description: The Alphonso mango is one of the most popular and premium varieties of mango. Known for its rich, sweet taste and vibrant golden color, this tree produces high-quality fruits perfect for eating fresh or making desserts.

name: Dasheri Mango Tree
description: Dasheri mango is renowned for its exceptional sweetness and aromatic flavor. This North Indian variety is perfect for home gardens and produces medium-sized fruits with smooth, thin skin.

name: Langra Mango Tree
description: Langra mango is a popular variety from Varanasi, India. It has a unique sweet-tangy flavor and greenish skin even when ripe. This hardy tree adapts well to various climates.

name: Lemon Tree (Kagati)
description: Dwarf lemon tree perfect for Nepali climate. Produces juicy, aromatic lemons rich in Vitamin C. Ideal for home gardens and containers. Flowers throughout the year.

name: Guava Tree (Amba)
description: High-quality guava variety suited for Nepali weather. Bears sweet and crunchy fruits twice a year. Rich in vitamins and minerals. Low maintenance and disease-resistant.

name: Rose Plant (Hybrid)
description: Beautiful hybrid rose plant with vibrant colors. Blooms continuously throughout the season. Perfect for gardens and decorative purposes. Available in red, pink, yellow, and white varieties.

name: Bougainvillea
description: Stunning ornamental plant with vibrant colored bracts. Excellent for hedges, arches, and wall coverage. Drought-tolerant and low maintenance. Blooms profusely in full sunlight.

name: Money Plant (Pothos)
description: Popular indoor plant known for bringing good luck and prosperity. Easy to grow and maintain. Purifies air and thrives in low light conditions. Perfect for homes and offices.

name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria)
description: Extremely hardy indoor plant that purifies air by removing toxins. Requires minimal watering and care. Grows well in various light conditions. Known for converting CO2 to oxygen at night.

name: Tulsi (Holy Basil)
description: Sacred plant in Nepali culture with numerous medicinal properties. Boosts immunity, relieves stress, and purifies air. Easy to grow in pots or ground. Requires moderate sunlight and water.

name: Mint Plant (Pudina)
description: Aromatic herb widely used in Nepali cuisine and traditional medicine. Fast-growing and easy to maintain. Perfect for kitchen gardens. Great for teas, chutneys, and garnishing.

name: Jasmine Plant (Chameli)
description: Fragrant flowering plant with beautiful white blooms. Extensively used for garlands and religious ceremonies. Night-blooming variety with intense fragrance. Can be grown as climber or bush.
